name: Tetrassault V1.0
description:
Formerly known as "Tetra Invaders". Mostly to give access to people working on it. Check out the (in-works)website if you want to know more about it, or just follow news about it(when I start uploading news) http://tetrassault.weebly.com/

1 controller and keyboard currently.

Buttons for player 1: Keyboard Z,X,C,V, A,S,D,F, Shift, Arrows

Buttons for player 2: Controller
